text: The Parliament of Malta ( or also known as Il-MaÄ§det ta' Malta) is the constitutional legislative body in Malta, located in Valletta. The parliament is unicameral, with a democratically elected House of Representatives and the President of Malta. By Constitutional law, all government ministers, including the Prime Minister, must be members of the House of Representatives. ==References== Malta Category:Government of Malta Category:Unicameral legislatures
title: Parliament of Malta
